bot_queries.title: greetings
bot_responses: Welcome to Solent_digitalbank-Iam Emily your virtual assistant
How can i help you today

bot_queries.title: query
bot_responses:
You are connected to Emily
 To get started,please select the below options:
1)Accounts,
2)Payments,
3)Cards,
4)I have a different query.

bot_queries.title: Account/product opening
customer_input_queries: I would like to know about Account/product opening
bot_responses:
Please choose the enquiry from the list below:
1)open an overseas account
2)Travel Insurance
3)Current account
4)credit card application timescales

bot_queries.title: Current account
customer_input_queries: I would like to know about Current account information
bot_responses:
Thanks for your enquiry. Please select the following options:
1)Applying for a current account
2)converting current account
3)Checking application progress
4)I have a different enquiry

bot_queries.title: Applying for a current account
customer_input_queries: I want to know details on how to apply for a current account
bot_responses:
Do you have an existing Solent_digitalbank current account?
Yes
No I do not have

bot_queries.title: Solent digital bank current account
customer_input_queries: No I do not have Solent digital bank current account
bot_responses:
Okay,we would be able to help with the application,if you could give us a call.
 we would be able to connect 8am to 8pm every day.
If you are calling from the UK:
+44 3577 444483
From outside the UK:
+44 1226207177

bot_queries.title: student account opening
bot_responses:
Regarding the student account please apply online and find out more information about the account
by selecting the link:https://www.solentdigitalbank.co.uk/current-accounts/student/

bot_queries.title: payments
customer_input_queries: I would like to know about payment details
bot_responses:
Great, here are the options I have for you.
1)unrecognised transaction
2)payments and transfers
3)global money
4)unusual account activity

bot_queries.title: payments and transfers
customer_input_queries: I would like to know about payments and transfers details
bot_responses:
Please choose your enquiry from the list below.
1)how can i pay my credit card
2)set up a new payment
3)cancel a direct debit
4)how do i make a transfer

bot_queries.title: transfers
customer_input_queries: I would like to know, how do I make a transfer
bot_responses:
you can make payments via mobile banking app,in branch or by giving us a call.
Please click on the link below for instructions on how to complete
https://www.solentdigitalbank.co.uk/help/banking-made-easy/making/payments
Thanks for contacting us today.

bot_queries.title: different query
bot_responses:
If you're an existing Solent 
digitalbank customer, please connect us on the Mobile Banking app or Online
Banking. Here are some other ways you can connect with us:
https://www.solentdigitalbank.co.uk/help

bot_queries.title: Telephone banking
bot_responses:
We are here to support you over the phone. For queries about your
transactions,however, it is often quicker and easier to go online or use our app
to chat with us -this service is available 24/7 and you can use it at a time and place that suits you.For more information on Telephone Banking, click on the link below:
https://www.solentdigitalbank.co.uk/ways-to-bank/phone-banking

bot_queries.title: complaint
bot_responses: Please accept my apologies

bot_queries.title: Location
customer_input_queries: what is the location of the bank
bot_responses: solent bank is located in civic centre, near Marlands shop.

bot_queries.title: update details
bot_responses:
please change your details by logging in to online banking:
https://www.solentbank.co.uk

bot_queries.title: goodbye
bot_responses: Sad to see you go :(
Talk you later
Goodbye

bot_queries.title: thanks

Any time!
